basics.name: Nathan Savari
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Fullstack Developer with a passion for modern web development. Experienced in creating and maintaining web applications with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript's frameworks like Next.js. Skilled in optimizing web pages for usability and performance. Curious to try new things like GO, Svelte, or Astro.

work.summary: Development and maintenance of several websites, collaboration with multidisciplinary teams, analyzing customer needs, designing solutions, and advanced mastery of web programming languages.
Managing product definition and development, working with technical teams, organizing product lifecycle, analyzing user needs and market trends, and managing data flows.
Development and maintenance of the Avenir Climatique website, optimizing for search engines, and collaborating with the team.

courses: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Mobile application development with React Native
Design and development of digital marketing strategies
Mastery of online marketing tools such as Google Analytics and AdWords
Creation of advertising campaigns on social networks
Analysis of campaign results and performance optimization
Marketing project management and coordination of multidisciplinary teams
